1453.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|107|309$قَدْ|"Verily,|66|135|1097$أُجِيبَت|has been answered|148|217|8291$دَّعْوَتُكُمَا|(the) invocation of both of you.|232|266|8292$فَٱسْتَقِيمَا|So you two (keep to the) straight way.|283|289|8293$وَلَا|And (do) not|105|118|25$تَتَّبِعَآنِّ|follow|81|94|8294$سَبِيلَ|(the) way|86|99|6800$ٱلَّذِينَ|(of) those who|119|125|20$لَا|(do) not|75|329|30$يَعْلَمُونَ|know."|92|346|115$

1454.verse: ۞ وَجَـٰوَزْنَا|And We took across|153|171|6777$بِبَنِىٓ|(the) Children|111|146|8295$إِسْرَٲٓءِيلَ|(of) Israel -|104|139|412$ٱلْبَحْرَ|the sea,|75|110|493$فَأَتْبَعَهُمْ|and followed them|141|159|8296$فِرْعَوْنُ|Firaun|93|101|6705$وَجُنُودُهُۥ|and his hosts|108|125|8297$بَغْيًا|(in) rebellion|102|119|864$وَعَدْوًا‌ۖ|and enmity,|98|115|8298$حَتَّىٰٓ|until|64|81|526$إِذَآ|when|55|72|1370$أَدْرَكَهُ|overtook him|105|113|8299$ٱلْغَرَقُ|the drowning,|111|118|8300$قَالَ|he said,|72|86|309$ءَامَنتُ|"I believe|84|98|8301$أَنَّهُۥ|that|62|76|2697$لَآ|(there is) no|103|117|30$إِلَـٰهَ|god|53|67|2266$إِلَّا|except|65|79|86$ٱلَّذِىٓ|the One,|78|85|138$ءَامَنَتْ بِهِۦ|in Whom believe|127|146|8302$بَنُوٓاْ إِسْرَٲٓءِيلَ|the Children of Israel,|163|200|8303$وَأَنَا۟|and I am|78|115|1401$مِنَ|of|50|87|156$ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ|the Muslims."|109|128|6229$

1456.verse: فَٱلْيَوْمَ|So today|80|99|6437$نُنَجِّيكَ|We will save you|131|169|8307$بِبَدَنِكَ|in your body,|107|145|8308$لِتَكُونَ|that you may be|130|168|8309$لِمَنْ|for (those) who|124|143|1356$خَلْفَكَ|succeed you|104|110|8310$ءَايَةً‌ۚ|a sign.|64|76|2339$وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|110|713$كَثِيرًا|many|72|84|275$مِّنَ|among|63|75|156$ٱلنَّاسِ|the mankind|100|112|75$عَنْ|of|54|66|1105$ءَايَـٰتِنَا|Our Signs|83|89|1344$لَغَـٰفِلُونَ|(are) surely heedless."|169|169|8311$

1457.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily,|90|101|640$بَوَّأْنَا|We settled|92|113|8312$بَنِىٓ|(the) Children|111|132|780$إِسْرَٲٓءِيلَ|(of) Israel|104|125|412$مُبَوَّأَ|(in) a settlement|132|153|8313$صِدْقٍ|honorable,|89|100|8314$وَرَزَقْنَـٰهُم|and We provided them|169|184|8315$مِّنَ|with|50|81|156$ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ|the good things,|129|160|6915$فَمَا|and not|71|102|132$ٱخْتَلَفُواْ|they differ|89|120|1512$حَتَّىٰ|until|64|79|526$جَآءَهُمُ|came to them|112|126|2702$ٱلْعِلْمُ‌ۚ|the knowledge.|121|150|2703$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|99|58$رَبَّكَ|your Lord|82|111|586$يَقْضِى|will judge|82|111|8316$بَيْنَهُمْ|between them|115|129|1056$يَوْمَ|(on) the Day|105|124|1057$ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ|(of) the Resurrection,|164|202|820$فِيمَا|concerning what|130|168|1058$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|155|94$فِيهِ|[in it]|57|76|32$يَخْتَلِفُونَ|differ.|99|99|1059$

1459.verse: وَلَا|And (do) not|105|122|25$تَكُونَنَّ|be|80|115|1323$مِنَ|of|50|85|156$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|124|20$كَذَّبُواْ|deny|73|108|2650$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ|(the) Signs of Allah,|153|170|2612$فَتَكُونَ|then you will be|125|218|4904$مِنَ|among|63|248|156$ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ|the losers.|116|209|639$

1461.verse: وَلَوْ|Even if|65|77|179$جَآءَتْهُمْ|comes to them|119|144|4930$كُلُّ|every|57|82|575$ءَايَةٍ|Sign|60|85|998$حَتَّىٰ|until|64|89|526$يَرَوُاْ|they see|78|103|8289$ٱلْعَذَابَ|the punishment -|134|146|1442$ٱلْأَلِيمَ|the painful.|95|95|8290$

1453.verse: [Allah] said, "Your supplication has been answered." So remain on a right course and follow not the way of those who do not know."

1454.verse: And We took the Children of Israel across the sea, and Pharaoh and his soldiers pursued them in tyranny and enmity until, when drowning overtook him, he said, "I believe that there is no deity except that in whom the Children of Israel believe, and I am of the Muslims."

1455.verse: Now? And you had disobeyed [Him] before and were of the corrupters?

1456.verse: So today We will save you in body that you may be to those who succeed you a sign. And indeed, many among the people, of Our signs, are heedless

1457.verse: And We had certainty settled the Children of Israel in an agreeable settlement and provided them with good things. And they did not differ until [after] knowledge had come to them. Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ

1458.verse: So if you are in doubt, [O Muhammad], about that which We have revealed to you, then ask those who have been reading the Scripture before you. The truth has certainly come to you from your Lord, so never be among the doubters.

1459.verse: And never be of those who deny the signs of Allah and [thus] be among the losers.

1460.verse: Indeed, those upon whom the word of your Lord has come into effect will not believe,

1461.verse: Even if every sign should come to them, until they see the painful punishment.
